mapper.select: select to_char(rd.reserveDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') reserveDate, u.userNo, r.reserveNo, c.cafeName, t.themeName, r.reservePerson, rt.reserveTime, to_char(r.payment, '999,999') payment, nvl(p.gameNo, 0) gameNo, t.themeNo from users u, cafe c, theme t, reserveDate rd, reserveTime rt, reserve r, preRecord p where c.cafeNo = t.cafeNo and t.themeNo = rd.themeNo and rd.reserveDateNo = rt.reserveDateNo and rt.reserveTimeNo = r.reserveTimeNo and r.userNo = u.userNo and r.reserveNo = p.reserveNo(+) and u.userNo = #{userNo} order by reserveDate desc

select c.cafeName, t.themeImg, t.themeName, to_char(rd.reserveDate, 'yyyymmdd') reserveDate, t.themeNo, r.reserveNo, r.reservePerson, r.reserveName, r.reserveHp, to_char(r.payment,'999,999') payment, rt.reserveTime, nvl(p.gameNo, 0) gameNo from cafe c, theme t, reserveDate rd, reserveTime rt, reserve r, preRecord p where c.cafeNo = t.cafeno and t.themeNo = rd.themeno and rd.reservedateno = rt.reservedateno and rt.reservetimeno = r.reservetimeno and r.reserveNo = p.reserveNo(+) and r.reserveNo = #{reserveNo}
select u.userName, r.recordTime, r.recordHints, r.recordClear from prerecord p, record r, users u where p.gameno = r.gameno and r.userno = u.userno and p.gameNo = #{gameNo}
select r.reservePerson, u.id from reserve r, users u, reservePeople rp where r.reserveNo = rp.reserveNo and rp.userNo = u.userNo and r.reserveNo = #{reserveNo}
